page.title: 20BMX BIKES IN EXETER
page.content: In 1985 they are building a BMX track down at Marsh Barton. When it is finished it will be one of the best tracks in Great Britain and on August 25th 1985 a lot of top BMX riders are coming to Exeter to test the track. A BMX track is a course that you ride over on a special bike called a{BMX. } When you go round the track you do jumps and other things on the course. The bikes are specially designed so that they can take the punishment of landing after a jump. Cycling Profiency is a course you have to do to show your skill at riding a bike and if you pass it you get a certificate and a badge. We have all done Cycling Profiency at school and nobody failed.
